For reasons that are unclear, different forms of X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy can be seen in affected individuals within the same family.",GHR,X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy
How many people are affected by X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy ?,"The prevalence of X-linked adrenoleukodystrophy is 1 in 20,000 to 50,000 individuals worldwide.
